Summary: Yellow/Orange star-like object sped though the sky
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Amherst
There were no other sightings in Amherst on or around May 19th 2012
divs: sighting detailspossible the same event as 38245. a yellow\orange star\planet-like object descended in a star like path from the southeast to east in the sky but traveled faster than one would normally. it appear during dinner time, we were outside eating when we noticed it, binoculars confirmed the color and shape, when trying to set up the telescope it had already gone below the tree line a few minutes later. i thought i might have been venus but it near the sun right now, saturn was in the vicinity but it doesn't move that fast.
